title: New apartment for sale in Rajagiriya
details: Brand new. Floor area 1,200 sq.ft. It has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Unfurnished. Fully air conditioned. Hot water in both bathrooms. Separate maid’s quarters and 1 parking slot available. Apartment complex has a swimming pool, gym, and rooftop terrace. Rs. 36Mn. Negotiable.
